allPosts.title: Day in the Life: Graduate Engineering
allPosts.excerpt: There are hundreds of different blog starters out there. But none felt quite right. So I built my own. Based off the basic Next.js Blog Starter, but now with several handy features like dark mode (using local storage) or Google Analytics. It comes with Storybook too.

allPosts.title: Getting started with this template
allPosts.excerpt: Everything you need to know to get a Next.js blog up and running.

allPosts.title: Markdown reference
allPosts.excerpt: Sick of starters that accept markdown, but don't come with any built-in styling? Check out what works right out of the box.
